Why should family make with low income or children with low income parents be discriminated into not having a holiday term time when prices are WAY cheaper! 
My children attendance is always 90% or above my children go to school nearly every day even when then come to me don’t feel well of they go! 
I feel it unfair to fine for each child an each parent and should change to allowing holiday is each child is over 90% attendance for
